dccConfigParams Struct Reference
IP » DCC

Structure containing parameters for DCC module configuration. More...

#include <dcc.h>

Data Fields

uint32_t mode
 
uint32_t clkSrc0

uint32_t seedSrc1
 

Detailed Description

Structure containing parameters for DCC module configuration.

Field Documentation

uint32_t dccConfigParams::alternateClkSrc1

Select alternate clock source. TRUE: Alternate clock source is selected and 'clkSrc1' will be ignored. FALSE: Clock source is selected as per 'clkSrc1'.

uint32_t dccConfigParams::clkSrc0

Clock source for COUNT0 i.e. reference clock. Refer enum dccClkSrc0_t.

uint32_t dccConfigParams::clkSrc1

Clock source for COUNT1 i.e. clock signal to be tested. Refer enum dccClkSrc1_t. NOTE: This will parameter will be ignored if 'alternateClkSrc1' is set TRUE.

uint32_t dccConfigParams::mode

Mode of operation for DCC module. Refer enum dccOperationMode_t.

uint32_t dccConfigParams::seedSrc0

Preload value/seed value for COUNT0

uint32_t dccConfigParams::seedSrc1

Preload value/seed value for COUNT1

uint32_t dccConfigParams::seedValid0

Preload value/seed value for VALID0
